Data: 2 pm: Sri Lanka win the toss and will have a bat
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run right on target first up with one holding its line on off stump, Tharanga defends to the on side with a closed bat face
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run has a waft at one leaving him with the angle, feet not moving yet, and is beaten
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run tight line from Lee around off stump, Tharanga cautiously pats it away towards extra cover
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run Lee giving nothing away in terms of width, Tharanga tries to force him off the back foot but just manages to push to extra cover

Lee to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs Tharanga picks up the first boundary, just stands in the crease and pushes a length ball hard, and the timing is good enough to beat extra cover trying to cut it off to his left, there is no mid off
Lee to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs and again, a bit fuller from Lee, no movement, Tharanga hits it with a big straight followthrough through mid off
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run and first ball Dilshan tries to clobber him through covers but gets nowhere near connecting one leaving him off a length

Bollinger to Dilshan, FOUR runs this time he gets four, very well played, he was starting to lunge at this fuller one with a big backlift, then saw it was better to hang the bat and push with an open face, and timed it past a diving Lee in to the third man boundary
Bollinger to Dilshan, FOUR runs another one, this one is in Dilshan's slot, Bollinger goes full, goes wide, Dilshan happily plonks front foot out and crashes it through the two men around point
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run Dilshan is already in top gear, he looks to blast this one through extra cover, but Bollinger gets a bit of lift from a length and he is beaten
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run steepling bounce for Doug, close to off stump, Dilshan wisely lets it go
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run now he serves up the fuller one with a bit of width for the drive, Dilshan goes after it but cannot connect
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run plays out a length ball on the stumps towards short midwicket

Lee to Upul Tharanga, 1 run quick single in front of cover as Tharanga taps a shortish one on the off side, Smith comes charging in and lobs the throw towards the stumps to have Dilshan going for the dive, but not before they collide and go sprawling on the ground, Smith looks a touch out of breath
Lee to Dilshan, no run driven off the backfoot to mid-off
Lee to Dilshan, no run goes for the whiplash pull off a marginally short ball, but cannot beat square leg
Lee to Dilshan, no run mistimes the shot as he looks to crash a length ball through cover, ball rolls away to shortish cover
Lee to Dilshan, no run goes for another big drive and mistimes a fuller delivery on to pad and to short cover

Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs lovely shot, Tharanga picks up four for this, it looked like it would fetch him a single at the best as he came forward and pushed a length ball without any followthrough, but the timing and the outfield took care of the rest and extra cover gave up the chase i
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, 1 run goes fullish on the pads and is picked away through square leg
Bollinger to Dilshan, 1 leg bye and troubles him with the change in angle, dropping it back of a length and hitting Dilshan on the body as he is caught on the crease, ball rolls away behind point
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs Tharanga is motoring along nicely now, he gets another full delivery on the pads and puts it away in front of square leg
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run Tharanga is middling them neatly, comes forward to a length ball and pings mid off with a firm push
Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, 2 runs well played again, he was coming forward as Doug angled the ball around middle and leg, so he stopped the movement and adjusted to clip the ball past midwicket
Lee to Dilshan, no run goes for the one in the blockhole around off, and Dilshan digs it out towards covers
Lee to Dilshan, 1 run Dilshan manages to get on top of a shortish ball and swivels to pull through square leg, there is a man in the deep there

Lee to Upul Tharanga, 1 run goes back and tries to punch on the off side, the ball takes the outer half and flies to third man, the bounce has been pretty true so far, and there hasn't been any movement apart from the first delivery
Lee to Dilshan, 1 run yet again Lee bangs in the short ball to Dilshan who goes back and cracks the pull to deep square leg
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run gets it off the inner half towards shortish midwicket as Lee brings it in with the angle from wide of the crease
Lee to Upul Tharanga, no run Lee targets the stumps with the changed angle, but Tharanga brings down a closed face and gets it past short midwicket
Bollinger to Dilshan, 1 run gets well forward and tries to slap-drive past extra cover, mid off gets around and fires in the throw, but Dilshan gets home in the end

Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, no run superb short ball, that must have taken a lot of effort on this wicket, flying at Tharanga's throat, who does well to get head out of harm's way, Doug gives him a stare and a word or two

Bollinger to Upul Tharanga, 1 run chance for a run out, but Dilshan is very quick, Tharanga managed an inside edge in front of square leg, the man from midwicket charged in and let rip but Dilshan was in no trouble
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run for once, he quietly plays out a length ball coming in towards square leg
Bollinger to Dilshan, 1 wide sends it wide down leg with the angle from round the wicket
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run tight delivery coming in with the angle around middle, Dilshan carefully pats it away on the leg side
Bollinger to Dilshan, no run another tight one from Doug to end a good over for Australia, Dilshan has no width to swing the bat and blocks down the track
Watson to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs what a shot, Tharanga is middling them and they are racing past the infield on this outfield, just pushes a length just outside off stump and it zooms past covers
Watson to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs a bit more bottom hand on this one, same result, gets a length ball off the inner half past Watson and mid on drives, but he didn't have much of a chance
Watson to Upul Tharanga, no run steered wide of point from the crease
Watson to Upul Tharanga, no run slows it down, that will be key on this wicket now and then, Tharanga goes back in the crease and blocks towards cover
Watson to Upul Tharanga, no run tries to shuffle and work one from middle and leg past short fine leg but cannot beat the man
Watson to Upul Tharanga, no run good comeback from Watson, but Sri Lanka are looking in no trouble at all, right on off stump, and Tharanga defends towards cover
Doherty to Dilshan, no run bit of turn, but shortish and Dilshan backs away to cut it straight to cover, gets away this time
Doherty to Dilshan, no run again some turn from outside off, he steers it with fast hands behind point
Doherty to Dilshan, no run well bowled, lot fuller, bit of flight, he squeezes it back to the bowler
Doherty to Dilshan, no run carefully comes on the front foot to push a tossed up ball towards covers
Doherty to Dilshan, no run another good delivery, Dilshan getting impatient, tries to come down the track, but sees it dipping full and pats it away in the end back towards the bowler
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run better from Dilshan, he gets around a full delivery to drive with the turn to long off, but good first over from Doherty, used the flight well

Watson to Dilshan, FOUR runs this time Dilshan will get the pull to the boundary, he had been hurried by Lee's pace earlier on a few occasions, Watson's short ball comes on a touch slower and he gets on top of it and cracks it past the man in the deep to the midwicket boundary
Watson to Dilshan, no run blocks a fuller one on the off side
Watson to Dilshan, no run looks to have a go at a length ball from the back foot, sees it head for the stumps and blocks back to the bowler
Watson to Dilshan, no run Dilshan is moving about in the crease, looking for the runs all the time, here he drives a length ball off the front foot, straight to mid off
Watson to Dilshan, 1 leg bye gets the single now, Watson goes with the angle on the pads and he trickles it square on the leg side
Watson to Upul Tharanga, no run good line to Tharanga, cramping him for room with one around middle, defended from the crease
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run comes down the track, gets beside the line of a flatter one and reaches out to drive to long off
Doherty to Upul Tharanga, no run shuffles and works one turning in from outside off to short midwicket
Doherty to Upul Tharanga, FOUR runs a bit more fuller with the length, and Tharanga goes on the knee for the big sweep, and gets it behind square leg

Doherty to Upul Tharanga, OUT Doherty strikes, Tharanga went back as he saw a marginally shortish one, it turned in sharply and beat his attempted cut to hit off stump, he was looking really good, Doherty is pumped up
Doherty to Sangakkara, FOUR runs superb strike first ball, Sanga comes down the track right away as Doherty tosses it up and lifts him over midwicket with the turn
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run shuffles well across and blocks a turning delivery down the track
Hussey to Dilshan, no run turns in from outside off, steered to backward point
Hussey to Dilshan, no run forces a fuller one back to the bowler
Hussey to Dilshan, 2 runs hits this one in to the leg side in front of square and comes back for the second
Hussey to Dilshan, no run fires it in full, Dilshan cracks it back down the track, he is twitching for a run off every delivery
Hussey to Dilshan, FOUR runs short and wide, Dilshan goes back as it hurries in, and cracks the cut well in front of point
Hussey to Dilshan, 3 runs tries to force another one through the off side, the ball is struck hard and bursts through the man at shortish extra cover
Doherty to Dilshan, no run well bowled, tossing it up slowly, making him get forward, thickish outside edge towards point as it turns away
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run this time he tossed it in full with the angle around middle and leg, Dilshan drives with the turn to long off
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run bowled flatter and full outside off, he gets forward to defend towards point
Doherty to Sangakkara, FOUR runs fired in on the stumps, Sanga slithers across and gets it off middle stump with a nudge that flies fine on the leg side
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run gets down the track and pushes to long on with a straight bat
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run reaches out to drive a full one with the turn to sweeper cover
Hussey to Dilshan, 1 run flicked with the turn from around middle to square leg
Hussey to Sangakkara, 1 run gentle flat shortish ball, he walks across and works it square on the leg side

Hussey to Dilshan, OUT Dilshan has thrown it away, he was looking increasingly impatient, got down the track as he saw some flight outside off, but was still not close enough to the ball as he blasted it straight to mid off
Hussey to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run shortish and flat, turning in on leg stump, Mahela tickles it to long leg off the pads
Hussey to Sangakkara, no run tossed up full from round the stumps and he goes forward to block
Hussey to Sangakkara, no run digs out a much fuller one back to the bowler
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushed down the track off the front foot
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run on the pads from a flat trajectory and trickles away on the leg side
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs gets some width and chops the cut past the man at slip
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run turning away from around middle and leg, he goes well back and blocks with an open face
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run a touch fuller around off, he comes forward to defend
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run squeezes one from outside off towards point with an open face
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run right on middle and leg from a fuller length, he goes forward to push with a straight bat to mid on
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run goes even fuller but on the pads and Sanga picks it to deep square leg

Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, OUT Australia are appealing for caught behind, it was a fullish and wide one slanted across Mahela who went for the drive, Haddin took it tumbling to his right, Australia are sure about it, umpire de Silva walks across towards square leg to check if it has carried, i
Johnson to Chandimal, 1 run off the mark right away with a confident whip off the pads backward of square leg
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run pushed off the front foot to cover from around off stump
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run lets this one outside off let go through to the keeper
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run goes back and tucks it in front of square leg
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run shuffles well across outside off and blocks down the track
Doherty to Sangakkara, no run comes down the track but clips straight to midwicket
Doherty to Sangakkara, FOUR runs superb shot from Sanga, he has been using his feet a lot today, got down the track again, close to the pitch and caressed it past extra cover
Doherty to Sangakkara, 1 run again he abandons the crease, and goes leg side this time, with the turn to deep midwicket
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run fires it in full on leg stump, worked away behind square leg
Johnson to Chandimal, no run gets well forward and stretches to squeeze a full and wide one to point
Johnson to Chandimal, 1 run gets on top of a shortish one outside off, and is in the air as he slashes to third man
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run gets forward and pushes solidly, the ball races past extra cover to widish mid off
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run full delivery driven to mid off

Johnson to Sangakkara, OUT Johnson has got Sanga, huge wicket, it is the slower one, bowled full close to off for the drive, mighty useful on this track, Sanga comes forward and looks to push hard. but pops it straight to short extra cover
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run good short delivery first up, jagging across close to the right hander who gets head out of the way quickly as he drops his wrists
Doherty to Chandimal, 1 run gets down the track, but gets an inside edge past Ponting as he looks to go over midwicket
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run tossed up full, it dips a tad and he works it to midwicket
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run fired in full on the pads with the angle, he watchfully pats it back
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs that is a confident shot, down the track he comes, reaches out a bit for the tossed up ball and smacks it with the turn straight over the bowler
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run worked on the leg side off a very full length on leg stump
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run slows it down outside off as he flights it, he gets forward to smother it
Johnson to Chandimal, FOUR runs bowls it full around off and Chandimal goes down the ground with a lovely straight followthrough as he eases forward
Johnson to Chandimal, no run opens him up with one coming in from short of a length on middle, he blocks in the end on the off side
Johnson to Chandimal, no run decides to get well forward to one slanted across him, and defends with an inside edge on the leg side
Johnson to Chandimal, 2 runs that could have been close, but he gets bat around front pad to send the pacy fullish ball racing past midwicket with a confident clip
Johnson to Chandimal, no run Johnson is bowling consistently full, takes it across and beats him on the forward push

Johnson to Chandimal, 1 run could have been close, he got across and pushed a length ball towards point, from where the throw was fired to the non-striker's, he was taking it a bit easy initially bit had to hurry across in the end

Bollinger to Chandimal, OUT what a catch that is from Michael Clarke, Doug slanted a length ball across Chandimal who got too far across and had a poke at it, the edge went between Haddin and Clarke at wide slip who flew to his left and grabbed the ball one-handed at it almost rushed passed him, s
Bollinger to Jeevan Mendis, no run gets forward to a pacy fullish delivery and it pops towards covers
Bollinger to Jeevan Mendis, no run shuffles well across to a short of a length ball and works it towards short midwicket, Doug is really charging in now
Bollinger to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run shuffles and gets on top of a shortish one that rises on him, he drops it in front of square leg and darts across
Bollinger to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs good short ball from Doug, he gets it to climb quickly at Angelo who gets outside the line, ducks a bit and hooks it wide of the keeper to the fine leg boundary
Bollinger to Angelo Mathews, no run left alone outside the off stump
Johnson to Jeevan Mendis, no run hits the bat hard with a length ball that kicks high in to the defensive blade of Mendis
Johnson to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run rips it full for the leg stump, he gets bat to it just in time to clip to deep midwicket
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs slanted very full and wide of off, Sri Lanka are still going for the shots, Angelo goes for the drive and edges it past slip
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run opens him up with a length ball around off stump, off the thickish edge past point
Johnson to Jeevan Mendis, OUT Johnson is pumped up, he has gone through Mendis' defenses with a pacy yorker from over the stumps that swung in a bit late to clatter in to off and middle
Johnson to Randiv, no run bangs it in short of a length, it climbs on the batsman who fends it away uncertainly on the off side
Bollinger to Angelo Mathews, no run Angelo continues to drive the pitched up deliveries, this one goes to mid off
Bollinger to Angelo Mathews, no run this time he leaves a length ball slanted across close to off stump

Bollinger to Angelo Mathews, no run now he even comes down the track looking to crash him through the off side, Johnson bowls it wider and Mathews takes one hand off the bat to send it towards extra cover
Bollinger to Angelo Mathews, 1 run pushes a length ball to sweeper cover to bring Suraj on strike
Bollinger to Randiv, no run beats him right away, with a length ball leaving him, Randiv goes a for a feeble push and does not make contact
Bollinger to Randiv, 2 runs gets forward and works a fuller one through vacant midwicket region
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run thickish edge as he pushes half forward to a length ball leaving him, the pace has been right up there from Mitch, ball rolls away to third man
Johnson to Randiv, no run beats him outside off as he goes for a loose push to one leaving him
Johnson to Randiv, 1 run goes for a push a touch away from the body to a pitched up ball and gets it down to third man
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run shuffles across and solidly blocks a length ball down the track
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run slanted across full and wide for the drive, he does not go hard at it and pushes it away towards extra cover

Johnson to Angelo Mathews, OUT Angelo becomes the latest Sri Lanka batsman to throw it away, these shots are certainly not on on this pitch, he looks to come down the track and make room to clobber a pitched up delivery over mid off, but cannot clear the man, straight to him
Bollinger to Randiv, no run another loose waft outside off stump, no contact with one leaving him
Bollinger to Randiv, no run uncertainly looks to press half forward and defend a slanted fullish one, inside edge goes on the leg side
Bollinger to Randiv, no run well played, pushes one leaving him with an open face to point
Bollinger to Randiv, no run brings down a short of a length ball, almost drops it on to the stumps, they think about a single as the ball rolls on the leg side, but Dough gets to it quickly
Bollinger to Randiv, no run gets well forward to drive a pitched up ball, along the ground, to extra cover
Bollinger to Randiv, no run forward again, and opening the face to guide a length ball to point's left
Johnson to Kulasekara, no run and yet another loose drive outside off, how many have there been today, fortunate not to get an edge off the full delivery
Johnson to Kulasekara, 1 run outside edge as he pushed at a very full one leaving him around off, but drops short of second slip
Johnson to Randiv, no run on a length now and slants it across outside off, another drive in the air
Johnson to Randiv, 2 runs goes on middle and leg and is worked through square leg
Johnson to Randiv, no run bends it in from wide of the crease, bounces and hits him high on the bat as he keeps it down on the off side
Johnson to Randiv, no run bowls it full for the drive outside off, but his attempt to connect fails
Bollinger to Kulasekara, no run slanted close to the off stump, and that is a good leave from Nuwan
Bollinger to Kulasekara, FOUR runs gets this one away, one the pads and he nudges it to the fine leg boundary, brings the crowd to life after some time
Bollinger to Kulasekara, no run another fine leave outside off from Nuwan as Bollinger looks to entice him with a length ball angled across outside off
Bollinger to Kulasekara, no run really full and pretty widish outside off, not called one though
Bollinger to Kulasekara, no run gets half forward and pushes a length ball in to the off side
Bollinger to Kulasekara, no run ends the over with another well-judged leave outside off as Doug gets it to lift off a length
Johnson to Randiv, SIX runs shot! Randiv shows how it's done, he takes a step out and clobbers a Johnson length ball over the wide long-off boundary
Johnson to Randiv, no run gets beside the line and pushes a pacy one leaving him outside off to point
Johnson to Randiv, no run a touch slower, he comes forward and bends low to push towards covers, Nuwan wants the run but is sent back rightly

Johnson to Randiv, 2 runs now he lets the bouncer rip right on target, but Randiv gets away, it was almost on him before he decided to swat-fend it away, and got it just over Haddin running to his left
Johnson to Randiv, no run pings mid off this time with a solid drive off a length ball
Johnson to Randiv, no run squeezes out a fuller one from around off towards extra cover
Lee to Kulasekara, FOUR runs and he is greeted with a thumping drive between extra cover and mid off first ball, it was pitched up and he went through with the shot
Lee to Kulasekara, no run leaves a length ball outside off well alone
Lee to Kulasekara, no run well played, gets forward and smothers a length ball down the track

Lee to Kulasekara, 1 run that is a snorter from Lee, Nuwan had no chance to get out of the way as it reared up at him, off the glove and away to HAddin's right who tried hard with a full-length dive but could not get to it
Lee to Randiv, no run pushed out towards point from the crease

Lee to Randiv, no run Lee lets the pacy yorker rip right on middle, but Randiv manages to get something on it, was it bat or pad, Australia think it is the pad, we will have to wait for the third umpire, it hit him on the back boot as it zoomed in, now was there a bit of an inside edge before that
Doherty to Kulasekara, no run gets on the front foot to defend one around off stump
Doherty to Kulasekara, no run stretches well forward again to smother a length delivery
Doherty to Kulasekara, no run makes room to guide one from off stump behind point, he was gone if he had missed that
Doherty to Kulasekara, no run blocked down the track off the front foot
Doherty to Kulasekara, no run Doherty keeping it tight, around off stump and he gets forward to defend
Doherty to Kulasekara, no run maiden over as another tight delivery bowled slowly around off is patted down the track
Lee to Randiv, no run makes a bit of room to guide a rising delivery from off stump to point
Lee to Randiv, 1 run Lee tries the full slower one, he picks it and forces it down to long off
Lee to Kulasekara, no run deep in the crease to block a short of a length ball, a touch in the air, on the leg side
Lee to Kulasekara, no run drives languidly from the crease but cannot beat extra cover
Lee to Kulasekara, no run almost another one, goes for a loose push from the crease as Lee slows it down a tad, but the ball drops short of extra cover
Lee to Kulasekara, no run well kept out, Lee with another yorker, but Nuwan gets across and digs it back to him
Doherty to Randiv, no run gets him to drive a tossed up ball, straight to extra cover
Doherty to Randiv, FOUR runs fetches it from well outside off stump, and paddles it to the fine leg boundary, pretty effectively done
Doherty to Randiv, 1 run goes for another sweep but this time off the top edge, there is no one at short fine leg though, safely done
Doherty to Kulasekara, no run pushed back to the bowler from a full length
Doherty to Kulasekara, no run darts it in very full, he tries to work it away but gets it back to Doherty again
Doherty to Kulasekara, no run blocked off the front foot down the track
Smith to Randiv, no run defended on the off side
Smith to Randiv, 1 run width from Smith, allowing the batsman to cut through cover
Smith to Kulasekara, no run fuller and straighter, played towards midwicket
Smith to Kulasekara, no run defended on the front foot
Smith to Kulasekara, no run blocked once again on the front foot
Smith to Kulasekara, no run driven firmly but towards the bowler
Doherty to Randiv, FOUR runs just over the man at extra cover, Randiv goes over the infield, makes room and swings with the turn just over the leaping fielder
Doherty to Randiv, 1 run punched towards sweeper cover for a single
Doherty to Kulasekara, 1 run gets forward to the pitch of this one to drive to sweeper cover
Doherty to Randiv, 1 run lunges forward and drives a full delivery down to long on
Doherty to Kulasekara, no run turns past the outside edge, pitches off and rips past him as he presses forward
Doherty to Kulasekara, no run gets well forward to smother one that bounces a touch from a length
Smith to Randiv, 1 leg bye nudges off the pads wide of the man at long leg
Smith to Kulasekara, no run tossed up full around middle and leg, blocked down the track

Smith to Kulasekara, no run another one rips past the outside edge, he came forward to try and defend a flighted one, but it turned sharply from a length, Haddin whipped the bails off, was the foot out of the ground? Replays show it wasn't, just behind the line
Smith to Kulasekara, 2 runs flighted full and he eases it past the bowler, they come back for the second as well
Smith to Kulasekara, 1 run solidly pushed off the front foot down to long off
Smith to Randiv, 1 run drops it a touch short and flat, he goes back and hits it away to sweeper cover
Johnson to Kulasekara, no run plays him from the crease, and pushes a length ball towards mid off
Johnson to Kulasekara, no run looks to slash a pacy length ball from close to the body, gets it straight to point
Johnson to Kulasekara, no run now goes pushing a touch away from the body, cannot beat point again
Johnson to Kulasekara, 1 run forcing punch off the back foot to a length ball, sweeper cover gets around to it
Johnson to Randiv, no run solidly defended towards covers as a fuller one zooms in for the off stump
Johnson to Randiv, no run more solid defence from Randiv, bat and pad close together as another one heading for the stumps it kept out
Lee to Kulasekara, 1 run carves a full and widish delivery wide of sweeper cover
Lee to Randiv, 1 run slower one from Lee again, he had set himself up to have a go at it, but checked the shot a bit to send it along the ground to long off
Lee to Kulasekara, 2 runs short ball in to the body now, he deals with it quite well, swats it in front of square leg and wide of the man in the deep
Lee to Kulasekara, no run right on a length on middle, but they have kept out such deliveries well, he blocks it past the non-striker and jogs out for the run, but mid on is already on to the ball
Lee to Kulasekara, 1 run goes for the lofted shot now off a pitched up delivery, there is long off in place
Lee to Randiv, 1 run squeezes out the yorker outside off to sweeper cover and goes for the single, the throw misses at the non-striker's
Doherty to Randiv, no run gets forward and pushes in to the leg side
Doherty to Randiv, 2 runs uses the angle, these two putting on some useful runs, gets down the track and lifts a full delivery over midwicket
Doherty to Randiv, 1 run shortish and punched off the back foot to sweeper cover
Doherty to Kulasekara, 1 run makes room to steer a flat delivery wide of point
Doherty to Randiv, 1 run shortish and wide outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
Doherty to Kulasekara, no run looks to have a go initially but gets well forward to block in the end, Doherty has bowled out
Lee to Randiv, FOUR runs shortish and wide, he is playing well here Randiv, gets on top, and cuts it past a diving Ponting at point
Lee to Randiv, 1 wide Lee gives him the bouncer, and is called for a wide as it sails over the batsman
Lee to Randiv, no run pushed away off a length to point
Lee to Randiv, no run drives a full delivery with a closed face to mid on
Lee to Randiv, no run slower one from Lee, he is already well forward and blocks it on the off side, Lee the athlete goes after it, fields and back-lobs the ball towards the non-striker's stumps
Lee to Randiv, FOUR runs these two have added 50 now, he goes a for a slash to a widish delivery and gets it well past Haddin
Lee to Randiv, no run leans in to a lovely front foot drive, too bad it went straight to extra cover

Johnson to Randiv, OUT they have finally broken the partnership, it is Johnson again, five for him, Randiv goes for the big lofted shot down the ground off a full delivery, but mishits it high in the air and Doherty settles under it at long off and takes it cleanly
Johnson to Mendis, no run beats him with a full delivery going across outside off, he hangs the bat out to defend but is nowhere close to the ball
Johnson to Mendis, no run very full delivery outside off stump, he tries to squeeze it away but misses again
Johnson to Mendis, no run bowls the length ball on leg stump now, he goes across to play it out towards midwicket
Johnson to Mendis, no run now the short ball that takes off outside off, he manages to sway away
Johnson to Mendis, OUT and gets his sixth with a slanted length ball that hits the top of off stump, Mendis just went pushing away from his body and was nowhere near the line of the ball

Smith to Kulasekara, SIX runs makes room and lofts him just over Bollinger at long off, got way outside leg stump and went for the big one, Bollinger leaped high to try and get to it but it eluded him
Smith to Kulasekara, no run pushed back down the track
Smith to Kulasekara, no run turning away from around middle and off, he tried to make room but then patted it away on the off side
Smith to Kulasekara, SIX runs and another one, he makes room again, goes down on a knee and lofts a full delivery with the turn over extra cover
Smith to Kulasekara, 1 run shuffles across to work a turning ball in to the leg side
Smith to Lakmal, no run keeps it out, tossed up full, on leg stump though, and he nudges it to square leg
Johnson to Kulasekara, no run tries to cut from off stump, shortish one rising on him, and he is beaten
Johnson to Kulasekara, no run guides a length ball straight to Ponting at point
Johnson to Kulasekara, no run Johnson goes for the stumps with a fuller length, he makes lot of room to carve him through the off side but cannot beat point yet again
Johnson to Kulasekara, no run low full this time outside off, he cannot get bat to it though
Johnson to Kulasekara, 1 run gets the single off the fifth ball with a push in front of mid off from the crease
Johnson to Lakmal, no run but he keeps out the full delivery slung in on the stumps with a calm forward block, the crowd likes that

Lee to Kulasekara, OUT superb shot, but what a catch from Mike Hussey, Lee gets his 350th ODI wicket, banged it in short and Nuwan cracked the pull right out of the middle of the bat, it was dying in front of Hussey at deep midwicket, but he dived forward to take the ball close to the ground

Career-best figures for Mitchell Johnson - also the fourth-best by an Australian in ODIs - have given Australia a target that they should chase down. The way Sri Lanka started, it seemed 300 was on but their top order threw away their wickets with aggressive shots chasing wide deliveries. Nuwan and Suraj

Welcome back for Australia's chase. Just under 200, they will back themselves to make the runs, though it could be tricky. They have four spinners to tackle, Ajantha, Jeevan, Suraj and Dilshan. Nuwan has the new ball, widish slip in place
Kulasekara to Watson, no run bowls a gentle length ball some way outside off, and he shoulders arms
Kulasekara to Watson, no run beats him outside off stump this time, with a similar delivery, came back in from a length a touch, Watson got forward and tried to play it with an open face
Kulasekara to Watson, no run goes fuller on the pads and he plays it out on the leg side
Kulasekara to Watson, no run gets on top of a length ball this time and pushes it out to point
Kulasekara to Watson, no run draws him forward again, he is bowling some way outside off stump on a length, and Watson is reaching out to push in to the off side
Kulasekara to Watson, no run tries to swat him down the ground with that big front foot plonked down the track, this one seams in a bit from outside off and he mistimes it back to the bowler
Lakmal to Haddin, no run good delivery, there for the drive, pitched up wide outside off and moving away, he resists and shoulders arms
Lakmal to Haddin, no run gets forward and blocks a fuller delivery towards point, looks for a single but there isn't any
Lakmal to Haddin, 1 run reaches out and drives a pitched up delivery, just past short cover and they take a comfortable single, first run for Australia
Lakmal to Watson, FOUR runs bangs in the short ball, going down the leg side with the angle, Watson throws his bat at it and gets the pull in the air to the fine leg boundary
Lakmal to Watson, 1 run gets some width outside off and goes hard again, slashes it wide of third man
Lakmal to Haddin, no run moving away after coming in with the angle on a length outside off, left alone right away
Kulasekara to Watson, no run gets well forward to one coming in around middle to block down the track
Kulasekara to Watson, no run another tight delivery has him defending carefully
Kulasekara to Watson, no run pings mid off with the flowing front foot drive this time off a fuller one
Kulasekara to Watson, FOUR runs that is typical violence from Watson, Kula bowls a length ball that gives some width to WAtson, and he pounces on it hungrily and crashes it past extra cover
Kulasekara to Watson, 2 runs brings the bat down late and guides a length ball wide of third man
Kulasekara to Watson, 1 run gets forward and opens the face to run a length ball down to third man
Lakmal to Watson, no run goes deep in the crease to defend a back of a length ball
Lakmal to Watson, no run looks to drive a straightish delivery past the bowler, but gets the bat down at an angle and mistimes the shot
Lakmal to Watson, no run well bowled, pacy fuller delivery right on the stumps, made him defend bat and pad close together
Lakmal to Watson, SIX runs this has disappeared, Watson sees this one pitched a bit short and latches on to it, he creams the pull so powerfully that it flies flat over the deep midwicket boundary
Lakmal to Watson, 1 run offers him width outside off and he cuts hard, third man is very square for him and fields
Lakmal to Haddin, 1 run eep, Haddin decides to come charging down the track, sees this full delivery a bit away from him, and throws his bat at it, gets it in the air down to third man
Kulasekara to Haddin, no run comes walking down the track now, but Kula drops it shorter and he has to defend

Kulasekara to Haddin, 3 runs again he looks to play from outside the crease, but goes feeling uncertainly at one that nips back in from a length, inside edge flies towards the fine leg boundary, but a diving stop there saves the run

Kulasekara to Watson, SIX runs Swatto's the word, he has really gone after this one, he is waiting for those marginally short ones, this one comes in off the seam, and he murders it way over deep midwicket
Kulasekara to Watson, no run beaten outside off stump on the drive this time as Kula lures him forward with a fullish and wide one
Kulasekara to Watson, 1 run comes in late from outside off, but Watson plays it very late and chops it down to third man
Kulasekara to Haddin, no run leaves this one alone outside off stump
Lakmal to Watson, no run gets forward a touch late to block one coming in with the angle from outside off
Lakmal to Watson, no run low away swinging full toss, he adjusts well to push it with a straight bat to short extra cover
Lakmal to Watson, 1 run bends the knee and chops a fuller one, gets it off the ground above the point fielder
Lakmal to Haddin, no run goes a touch uncertainly at one some way outside off stump, and mistimes the push in to the ground
Lakmal to Haddin, no run lovely delivery from Lakmal, he bowls it full in the blockhole close to off, and Haddin is lucky not to get an edge as he looks to belatedly dig it out
Lakmal to Haddin, FOUR runs that has been carved, full delivery outside off, Haddin makes some room, and lifts it over covers with an open face, looks good when it comes off, but when it doesn't ...
Mendis to Watson, no run comes in from just outside off as he flights it, defended carefully back to the bowler
Mendis to Watson, no run shortish one going straight on, he is able to read it off the pitch, and punches it back, but Haddin cannot get out in time, and it goes off his bat to mid off
Mendis to Watson, 1 run he stretches a long way forward and goes for the slog sweep off a tossed up ball, gets it wide of midwicket
Mendis to Haddin, no run beats him in the air with one that spins past the outside edge as Haddin goes forward to defend, Sanga has the bails off but Haddin had the back foot back in time
Mendis to Haddin, no run now this one spins back in, he has no clue about it, is already forward and tries to pat it away, ball sneaks in between bat and pad to somehow miss off stump
Mendis to Haddin, no run another one turns in, there is no one at short leg though, he gets forward and tries to defend, it bounces on to pad, they appeal for leg before now, not given
Lakmal to Watson, no run played out towards square leg off the pads
Lakmal to Watson, FOUR runs crash! Watson gets one pitched up, and gets on the front foot to emphatically slam it through extra cover
Lakmal to Watson, no run bends back in a tad from a length, he goes on the back foot with those two men hovering close by, and defends towards point
Lakmal to Watson, FOUR runs he goes after this one, not as short and on to him quickly, he went for the pull and got it just over mid on
Lakmal to Watson, FOUR runs they are feeding him with these lengths, short again, he is waiting for it, and eagerly smashes the pull over midwicket
Lakmal to Watson, no run there was width on this length ball, Watson got out towards it but cracked the drive straight to covers
Mendis to Haddin, 1 run googly turns in a long way from outside off, he shuffles outside the line and works it square on the leg side
Mendis to Watson, SIX runs Watson has gone after Mendis, tossed up, but a touch too full, and he gets under it to smack it over the straight boundary

Mendis to Watson, 1 run dropped, that was a dolly, but it has been put down, shortish and flat outside off, he latched on to the cut a bit too eagerly and hit it straight in the air to backward point, there is a fast bowler there, it is Lakmal who clangs it
Mendis to Haddin, 2 runs outside edge this time, but pas slip as he presses forward to a flatter one turning away
Mendis to Haddin, no run hurries on from a length, he is going deep in the crease to push to point
Kulasekara to Watson, no run almost through him, Nuwan brings it in with the angle from over the stumps, Watson goes for the drive, and almost inside edges on to the stumps
Kulasekara to Watson, no run blocked carefully off the front foot towards extra cover this time
Kulasekara to Watson, 1 run another one comes in off the seam from a length, inside edge rolls away off pad on the off side, Ponting is quick to get across for the single
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run that big backlift, that characteristic big shuffle forward, and a solid defensive push towards mid off
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run gets forward, keeps bat in front of pad and pushes one coming in to mid on
Kulasekara to Ponting, no run goes for a drive off a fuller one outside off, but mistimes it off the lower part of the blade in to the ground
Mendis to Watson, no run reaches out to a fuller delivery and drives it back to the bowler
Mendis to Watson, no run goes straigthish off a flatter trajectory outside off, diving stop at point saves the boundary off the cut
Mendis to Watson, no run he is hoping to lunge out and not allow the ball to do much after pitching, this one spins back in and almost sneaks in between bat and pad, inside edge saved him
Mendis to Watson, SIX runs the method works this time, and he gets to his 50 with a forward lunge and a swung six over wide long on
Mendis to Watson, no run defended down the track off the front foot
Mendis to Watson, 1 run looks to swipe him to cow corner with a huge stride forward, connects well, just wide of the man at midwicket who gets a hand to it
Randiv to Watson, no run goes past the outside edge, with one that does not turn much, it is the top spinner that goes past off stump

Randiv to Watson, SIX runs Watson is sticking to his methods and it is working well despite the odd scare, more effective against the off spinner, lunges forward, takes it on the half volley and slog sweeps way over deep midwicket
Randiv to Watson, SIX runs gets him to drop it marginally short and flat, and rocks back and shuffles to smoke the pull over deep midwicket, that is also 4000 ODI runs for Watson
Randiv to Watson, 2 runs fetches it from around middle and swings it wide of deep square leg who has to quickly get to his left to stop the ball
Randiv to Watson, no run beats him with the top spinner again, he bowls this one well, tosses it up and has WAtson pushing inside the line

Randiv to Watson, OUT Watson has fallen, the method was bound to come undone at least off one delivery, happened this time, Randiv tossed it up around middle and leg, Watson lunged for the sweep, and got a top edge that swirled to the man at short fine leg who went a few steps back and to his left
Mendis to Clarke, no run gets forward to a low full toss but cannot put it away past midwicket who dives to save some runs
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run playing off the back foot, pushes a flat delivery to sweeper cover
Mendis to Ponting, 2 runs whips a full delivery wristily in front of square leg
Mendis to Ponting, 1 run this one turned in from a fuller length, he delayed the shot to nudge it off the front foot fine on the leg side
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run turns in a tad from wide outside off, he gets forward, pushes it in front of point and they take a sharp run, direct hit and he was gone
Mendis to Ponting, no run gets deep in the crease to block a flattish delivery that hurries straight on
Randiv to Clarke, 1 run gets forward to a flighted one and eases it down with the turn to long on
Randiv to Ponting, no run leading edge as Ponting shuffles way across the stumps and tries to work him on the leg side, ball rolls along the ground towards cover
Randiv to Ponting, no run testing stuff from Randiv, tossed up full around off, turning in, played out square on the on side
Randiv to Ponting, no run gets forward to push with the turn to midwicket

Randiv to Ponting, FOUR runs Ponting survives, this was a strange shot really, tossed up delivery rushing on with overrspin, he bent the knee and tried to half-paddle it very uncertainly, top edge swirled over backward short leg
Randiv to Ponting, FOUR runs he plays this shot well, marginally short, rushing in, he quickly goes on the back foot and puts it away in front of point
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run pushed through quicker on the pads, and worked behind square leg
Mendis to Ponting, no run goes straight on from a length, he is a touch late on it but manages to push to point
Mendis to Ponting, 1 run shuffles across, waits on it, it is marginally shortish and he goes back to cut in front of point
Mendis to Clarke, no run comes down the track, gets too close to the pitch of the ball, and that is why he cannot beat mid on with the drive
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run leaves the crease again, better shot this time, but midwicket dives to stop the ball

Mendis to Ponting, no run almost went to slip, Ponting looking very uncertain this time, caught in the crease, tried to work it on the leg side late as it turned in, and the ball popped up to drop short of slip
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run blocked off the front foot down the track
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run gets forward and drives with a bit of a closed face, and mid on cuts it off
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 run slower one holding its line outside off, he adjusts and arches back to guide it past point
Kulasekara to Ponting, 1 run shuffles and tries to force a length ball with the angle through midwicket, mistimes it in front of mid on but will get the single
Kulasekara to Clarke, no run very low full toss, he gets to it and pushes down the track
Kulasekara to Clarke, 1 run shortish, wide, he cracks it to sweeper cover
Mendis to Clarke, no run beets him outside off with one that turns past him as he tries to push it off the back foot
Mendis to Clarke, no run tossed up, draws him forward, he gets out and smothers it off the pad
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run he seemed to pick this one as it turned in from a very full length, and he worked it in front of square leg
Mendis to Ponting, FOUR runs turning away, but that is short and flat outside off, Ponting is on the back foot and cuts late past backward point
Mendis to Ponting, 1 run goes on the back foot again and works it through square leg
Mendis to Clarke, no run Clarke gets well forward and blocks a tossed up ball
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, no run a touch short outside off, hit hard off the back foot but to the fielder at cover
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run fuller and wider outside off, Clarke reaches for it and drives
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run left alone outside of stump
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 2 runs Clarke steps forward, takes the ball on the full and hits it towards deep midwicket
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run driven off the front foot on the off side
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run nudged off the front foot towards midwicket
Randiv to Ponting, 1 run pushed off the front foot towards square leg
Randiv to Clarke, 1 run Clarke stays in his crease and plays the ball towards deep square
Randiv to Ponting, no run Ponting tries to pull but the length isn't short enough and he gets beaten
Randiv to Ponting, no run defended on the front foot on the leg side
Randiv to Ponting, no run Ponting moves forward and across and nudges towards square
Randiv to Ponting, 2 runs Ponting moves across, gets down on done knee and sweeps to long leg
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run skips down the track, takes it in th half volley and drives to long off
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run tossed up very wide and he drives away from the body wide of a diving extra cover
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run flat delivery turns away from back of a length, he gets back in the crease to cut to sweeper cover
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run another one flat,. short and wide and he slaps it off the back foot past extra cover
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run rips this one across the batsman from leg stump and he pushes it dwon the track
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run turns a long way away from the batsman but again from a shortish length, he mistimes the cut in to the ground
Randiv to Ponting, 1 run goes back smoothly to cut a short of a length ball to sweeper cover
Randiv to Clarke, 1 run again a touch short of a length, and he rocks back to pull it through square leg
Randiv to Ponting, 1 run lots of turn in to the batsman from round the wicket, but he is still able to punch in front of point as it is pitched short of a length
Randiv to Clarke, no run played out towards square leg
Randiv to Clarke, no run rocks back for the cut but slaps it straight to extra cover
Randiv to Clarke, no run goes deep in the crease to block a straightening shortish one
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, no run pushed away to extra cover off the front foot
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run down the leg side and he helps it wide of long leg with a sweep
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run good shot, comes down the track, gets close to the pitch and drives inside out through extra cover
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, no run draws him forward and has him pushing wide of point, Clarke does not want to go for the single
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, no run whoa, this one has taken off from a length, ripping across the outside edge as Ponting can only hold a straight bat and wonder what happened
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, no run stretches well forward to smother a fuller one this time
Randiv to Clarke, no run shuffles across to block a flighted length ball that bounces
Randiv to Clarke, no run pushed back down the track off the front foot
Randiv to Clarke, no run shuffles well across and works this one behind square leg
Randiv to Clarke, no run goes deep in the crease and plays out with the turn towards square leg
Randiv to Clarke, 1 run tosses it up generously, he comes down the track and drives with the turn to long on
Randiv to Ponting, no run gets in to a tangle as he looks to come forward then decides to go back and work him square, wants the single but is sent back
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run tossed up ball around leg stump, he leaves the crease and works him through square leg
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run drives off the front foot past a diving short extra cover, and the ball rolls down the ground
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run cuts a shortish one to sweeper cover
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run another one a touch short and pulled away to deep midwicket
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run turns away from short of a length, he cuts it away to sweeper cover
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, no run slapped away off the back foot straight to extra cover
Randiv to Clarke, 1 run shuffles across to work a turning delivery in front of square leg
Randiv to Ponting, no run gets bat in front of pad to work with the turn towards midwicket
Randiv to Ponting, no run gets well forward to defend down the track
Randiv to Ponting, no run stretches well forward to smother this one back to the bowler
Randiv to Ponting, FOUR runs goes for the slog sweep, and gets it off the middle of the bat, lunges forward and smacks it past square leg and in to the gap
Randiv to Ponting, no run gets forward and works on the leg side but straight to square leg
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run stays in the crease to punch a turning ball to sweeper cover
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, no run squared him up, he did this before to Ponting as well, spins sharply across his bat and takes the pad towards slip
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run the wrong 'un, but a touch short and he goes back to crack it to sweeper cover
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run too short and he rocks back and hammers it straight past the non-striker
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, no run tossed up ball pushed down the track

Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, no run Sri Lanka appeal as he is struck on the pad on the forward push, not given, Sri Lanka decide to refer it but it would have gone way outside off stump and he was struck outside the line as well
Lakmal to Clarke, no run marginally short and he latches on to the pull, Mahela at midwicket dives to save some runs
Lakmal to Clarke, 1 run widish outside off and he hits it to sweeper cover
Lakmal to Ponting, 1 wide wide delivery down the leg side from a full length
Lakmal to Ponting, FOUR runs that is a fine shot, full delivery coming in, Ponting gets forward and opens the face to place the drive between the bowler and mid off
Lakmal to Ponting, 1 run shuffles across and eases the full delivery around middle past midwicket
Lakmal to Clarke, no run low full toss driven hard but straight to mid on
Lakmal to Clarke, 1 run nicely done, short of a length ball angled in to the batsman, who gets around it and helps it wide of long leg with a short swing
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run comes down the track and drives against the turn to deep midwicket
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, no run gets forward and opens the face to push towards cover
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run too short, too flat, slapped off the back foot to sweeper cover
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run gets forward to drive a full delivery to long off
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run gets out of the crease and drives with the turn down to long off
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run again too short and turning away sharply, he gets to it and cuts to sweeper cover
Dilshan to Clarke, 2 runs too short and turning in, smacks the pull wide of deep midwicket who saves the boundary with a dive
Dilshan to Clarke, 1 run another short ball, does not get up much and he pulls to deep midwicket again
Dilshan to Ponting, 1 run worked in front of square leg off the back foot
Dilshan to Clarke, no run goes deep in the crease to push on the leg side
Dilshan to Clarke, 2 runs short again, they have overdone the short stuff, and they are not fast bowlers, he cracks the cut past point
Dilshan to Clarke, 1 wide short of a length and turning down leg
Dilshan to Clarke, no run just a touch fuller and he cannot get the timing on the cut and chops it in to the ground
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, no run eases a full delivery back to the bowler
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run worked off the front foot in front of square leg
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run how short is that, a lot, and it is slammed down to long off
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run tosses it up, so he comes down the track, and drives with the turn to long off
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run turning away from short of a length, hit straight to short extra cover
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 2 runs good shot, he skips down the track, and eases a full delivery through midwicket, the feet have moved well right from the first ball he has faced
Dilshan to Ponting, 1 run gets around one just outside off stump and works it through square leg
Dilshan to Clarke, 1 run down the track again and willing the ball down to long on
Dilshan to Ponting, no run turning in and blocked down the track
Dilshan to Ponting, no run can't put it away, turns in from short of a length but he cuts it to point
Dilshan to Ponting, 1 run worked with the turn through square leg
Dilshan to Clarke, 1 run turning in, he goes on the back foot to work through square leg
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run gets down the track yet again, and drives with the turn through extra cover
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run slaps the drive to sweeper cover off the front foot
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run cut off the back foot to sweeper cover
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, no run slapped off the back foot to extra cover
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run turning across, he goes back and pushes to sweeper cover
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run now he outdoes himself, comes down the track, and works it against the turn past midwicket, superb batting from Clarke, he has hardly looked ruffled
Dilshan to Clarke, no run turning sharply and bouncing but down the leg side
Dilshan to Clarke, no run played out down the track off the front foot
Dilshan to Clarke, 2 runs abandons the crease again and works it with the turn through midwicket
Dilshan to Clarke, 1 run again he pushes forward outside the line and works with the turn in front of square leg
Dilshan to Ponting, no run right forward in solid defence down the track

Dilshan to Ponting, 1 run that will be 50 for Ponting, there have been a few tense moments, but he has dug in resolutely and has progressed smoothly as his innings has progressed, drives this one down to long on
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run worked in to the leg side for a single
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run gets forward to defend a flat and fullish one
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run cuts hard but straight to backward point
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run this is really good batting against spin, tosses up, he comes down the track and caresses it wide of mid on against the turn
Jeevan Mendis to Ponting, 1 run a touch short and slapped off the back foot to sweeper cover
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run blocks a flat one around middle and leg down the track
Randiv to Ponting, 1 run driven with the turn down to long on to bring up the 100 stand
Randiv to Clarke, no run leaves the crease again but cannot work it past midwicket
Randiv to Clarke, 1 run this time he shuffles down the track and gets the work to the right of midwicket
Randiv to Ponting, no run tosses it up widish outside off, he gets forward to smother it
Randiv to Ponting, no run gets forward and across to work with the turn straight to midwicket
Dilshan to Clarke, no run takes it on the pads as he tries to work a flighted ball from around middle
Dilshan to Clarke, 1 run he gets it off the middle of the bat this time and gets it down to long on
Dilshan to Hussey, no run well bowled, angled in from round the stumps, and turning past his forward push
Dilshan to Hussey, no run bat and pad close together as he comes forward to defend
Dilshan to Hussey, 1 run off the mark with a punch past extra cover off the back foot
Dilshan to Clarke, 1 run goes well back in the crease to work with the turn behind square leg
Randiv to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke gets to his 50 with his first boundary, down the track, and lofting against the turn over wide long off, class innings
Randiv to Clarke, 1 leg bye turning down the leg side and he gets a tickle fine on it
Randiv to Hussey, no run opening the face to push a tossed up ball towards point
Randiv to Hussey, 1 run scores are level with a work off the back foot wide of midwicket
Randiv to Clarke, no run drives off the front foot but cannot beat mid off
Randiv to Clarke, no run low full toss on the pads, but Clarke works it straight to square leg
Dilshan to Hussey, no run still cannot get it, pushes straight to covers off the front foot
Dilshan to Hussey, no run played back down the track off the front foot
Dilshan to Hussey, no run tossed up and he lets it go outside off. now then
Dilshan to Hussey, no run pegged on the back foot with one hurrying on and blocks it back
Dilshan to Hussey, no run gets forward and shoulders arms to one that angles in close to off
Dilshan to Hussey, no run carved straight to cover from the crease, a maiden with a run required

Randiv to Clarke, 1 run Clarke does it in a way characteristic of this innings and of his general approach to spin, down the track and caresses a flighted ball with the turn between mid on and midwicket

Three half-centuries in a chase of 192, Watson threatened to blow Sri Lanka away before falling to spin, Ajantha Mendis threatened to do an encore of the second T20 before Ponting and Clarke dug in to ensure Australia motored to victory. Australia will be tested by the Sri Lanka spinners, who were short
Hang on for the presentation
That will be all from us for this game. Join us for the 2nd ODI on Sunday from Hambantota. This is Abhishek Purohit signing off. Thanks for all the feedback. Cheers!
Australia won by 7 wickets (with 71 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Mitchell Johnson, AUS
